name: Yosstin Steven Castillo Ramirez
label: Web developer, Systems Engineer
summary: Full Stack developer passionate about technological innovation, with experience in JavaScript, Python, and Java environments. I use frameworks like React, Spring Boot, and FastAPI to build efficient, scalable, and attractive solutions. I have worked on the development of SaaS platforms, focusing on creating interfaces that optimize user experience and on the graphical presentation of data to effectively communicate information. I am known for my ability to conceptualize and propose innovative ideas, as demonstrated in various projects by developing solutions from ideation to implementation. With a results-oriented approach and experience in agile methodologies, I am seeking challenging projects that drive my growth.
